channel.title: Help please
channel.description:
I didn't know where else to post this..Anywho... My account 'joshers2012' was stolen by the user 'PvpTurf', is there any way i can get it back?
Proof: http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=Dominionscape.no-ip.biz
It says:
"THIS SERVER HAS BEEN STOLEN BY PVP TURF DUE TO THE OWNER STEALING OUR PLAYERS.
http://***-***com
http://moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=pvp-turf.no-ip.biz"
I did not 'steal' his players. I was friends with his entire staff team, and when i made my server they decided to join, so Sam, being the power-hungry little kid he his, demotes and bans all of them for playing on a server other than his.

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

Your complaint will not be looked into in this topic, please post it in the server status page topic:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Read full topic

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Joshers:

Its semi popular. But the fact that the owners are both inconsiderate assholes drives the players away

In it for the money, and prolly can’t code for shit then. Try messaging MITB bout it.

Read full topic

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

It can’t be very popular anyways:
Threads: 155, Posts: 810, Members: 251, Active Members: 195

I had less members than that on my server, with FAR more posts.

Read full topic

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Um, might wanna edit out his site, or it might be considered advertising Anyways, I’d say to wait until a mod or Admin sees this. You can probably send a PM to Moparisthebest and he might be able to do something about it.

Read full topic
